name: SD Gundam Generation: Axis Senki
overview: SD Gundam Generation: Axis Senki ("SD Gundam Generation: Record of Axis War") is a turn-based strategy game for the Super Famicom. It is based on the First Neo-Zeon War of Mobile Suit Gundam ZZ. It is the third of six SD Gundam Generation games released for the Sufami Turbo peripheral, which uses smaller carts that are able to communicate with each other when placed in the Sufami Turbo device.
